name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
credits:
Thanks to Gremious for his amazing work with the Default Mod base, without which the Duelist would not exist! 

Big shoutout to Playmaker for various art contributions:
character selection button, spellcaster deck selection screen art, and the newer Yugi character model! 

Thanks to Einlenzer and 子夜微雪 for their hard work translating the game into French and Simplified Chinese! If you play in either of those languages and can read the words, it's probably because of these guys! Thanks!!
